column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The Ministry of Health announced this morning that there was 1 new case of COVID-19
column4: bringing the total detected to 118.------The patient is a 30-year-old Chinese woman who had direct contact with a Chinese man and his Vietnamese girlfriend. The man was diagnosed in China after leaving Cambodia and his girlfriend who was tested in Bavet.------On the April 3
column5: a Chinese man was diagnosed with new coronary pneumonia after he entered China from Cambodia. So far
column6: 4 close contacts have been diagnosed .------On the 6th
column7: the patient’s Vietnamese girlfriend was diagnosed
column9: a Cambodian couple was diagnosed with the infection.------A 40-year-old Cambodian man living in Phnom Penh’s Russey Keo district also retested with positive results after 15 days of recovery. He was then admitted to the Khmer-Soviet Friendship Hospital.------Six more people have recovered and been released from hospital:------A 79-year-old British woman from the Viking Cruise ship. After 2 negative tests eave the hospital to return to England.------* Two French men
column11: who were French tourists in Preah Sihanouk province. They are being kept in a hotel in Sihanoukville to wait for flights back to France.------* Three French women: 63
column13: tourists who are also waiting to return to France.------As of the morning of the 9th
column14: a total of 68 people have fully recovered
column15: with 50 receiving treatment. 1 person has relapsed. No deaths have been recorded.
